channel.title: Moparscape Cms, Beware of a hacker has been lurking
channel.description:
Please everybody, even moparscape CM's never try and leave your account for too long!, because if you do, this hacker will be posting VIRUSES This has happened to 3 MOPARSCAPE CMS, 1 is fedexer, who posted this idiotic virus, and boomer posting ANOTHER virus, and cannot remember the third one.
Mopar, Please find this imposter/Hacker and please BAN him off these forums!
I believe that this hacker, is the same hacker that hacked (sorry for hacked works) Futurscape forums!, another friend of mines forum.
so moparscape cms, be on ur guard... even if ur NOT a moderator still be on ur guard.. Lock this if required.. but please let some people READ THIS

item.title: Moparscape Cms, Beware of a hacker has been lurking
item.dc:creator: @Zenzie Zenzie
item.description:
@Zenzie wrote:

Xerocheez , VoiD [Beanie] , .DEVIL

From Xero’s P server forum … Yeah we know they steal passes via p servers

Read full topic
